scripts.clean: lerna exec --stream -- git clean -f -d -X && git clean -f -d -X
scripts.clean:locks: lerna exec --stream -- rimraf package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml && npm run clean
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u && lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream -- ncu -t minor -u -x @leanup/*,typescript
scripts.ncu:patch: ncu -t patch -u && lerna exec --ignore @template/* --stream -- ncu -t patch -u
scripts.ncu: npm run ncu:patch && npm run ncu:minor && npm run ncu:major
scripts.prepare: rimraf .husky && husky install && husky add .husky/commit-msg "npx commitlint --edit $1" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lerna run lint" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lerna run format"
scripts.ci: npm ci && lerna exec --concurrency 2 --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm ci
scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && lerna exec --stream -- npm outdated
